definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: The acids in tomato juice can degrade the drink’s other ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 番茄汁中的酸會削弱其他材料帶來的味覺。

sentences.english: Taste buds react to sweet, sour, salty, and bitter. Messages are sent from the taste buds to the areas in the cortex responsible for processing taste.
sentences.chinese: 信號會從味蕾傳送到大腦皮質中負責處理味覺的區域。

sentences.english: The lungs' taste receptors do differ from tongue taste buds.
sentences.chinese: 肺部的味覺感受體和舌頭的味蕾確實不同。

sentences.english: Imagine preparing a five-course dinner for the most distinguished palates in the world.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，爲世界上最豪華的味覺盛宴準備五道正菜。

sentences.english: Chilli sauce can titillate our palates.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒醬可以挑逗我們的味覺。

sentences.english: Cancer patients diminished sense of taste, loss of appetite, poor digestion.
sentences.chinese: 癌症病人的味覺減退，食慾下降，消化功能很差。

sentences.english: In the years since, Dr. DeVere has recovered much of his ability to smell and taste.
sentences.chinese: 從那年以後，他的大部分嗅覺和味覺得到了康復。

sentences.english: Such people are known to food experts as supertasters.
sentences.chinese: 而這些人被食物專家稱爲超級味覺者。

sentences.english: Scent-ual Scorpios really appreciate perfumes or colognes.
sentences.chinese: 完全是味覺動物的天蠍座對香水非常偏愛。

sentences.english: Taste and smell are closely connected.
sentences.chinese: 味覺和嗅覺是密切相關的。

sentences.english: Thus the authors concluded that taste aversion could be learned in-utero.
sentences.chinese: 因此，認爲，可以在宮內對味覺進行改變。

sentences.english: Chillis are an unusual acquired taste.
sentences.chinese: 辣味就是後天學來的味覺。

sentences.english: B. Taste acuity is developed over time after birth.
sentences.chinese: 味覺的敏度出生後隨着時間而發展變化。

sentences.english: The palate likes to get a little jolt of acid now and then.
sentences.chinese: 有時候人的味覺會需要一點酸。

sentences.english: Taste alone may not tell you which foods are high in sodium.
sentences.chinese: 光靠味覺你無法判斷哪些食物的鈉含量高。

sentences.english: Rounding the picture out with some taste and auditory input is even better.
sentences.chinese: 能夠將一幅畫勾勒出味覺和聽覺享受那就更棒了。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
